cab.content: From Viceroy. Avnuj Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,2Mi May 1920.(Received 31st.)6717. 28th May. Malleson wired 22nd May to 24th May :-1. Renewed rumours are spreading in Askabad regarding invasion of Persia by 9 Bolsheviks, which is strongly urged by Adalat party. ;-2. Acute political dissensions reported among Bolsheviks at Tashkent!, Merv, ** and Askabad.3. Garrison Kizil Arvat reported to have been increased recently to one infantry brigade.- 4. Bolsheviks appear to lie relieving Mussalman troops in garrisons on Central Asia Railway by centre troops and sending former in direction of Tashkent.
